snippet.title: Kleptonaut Release Trailer
snippet.description:
PC BETA AVAILABLE NOW https://space-bandit-studio.itch.io/kleptonaut

Trailer for the indie puzzle game, Kleptonaut. Kleptonaut is a game about robbing stores in zero-gravity. Pick up and throw items to propel yourself, solve puzzles, and wreak havoc in Nova-Mart's numerous establishments. Coming to PC/Mac June 2018.

Website: https://kleptonautgame.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KleptonautGame
Facebook: https://facebook.com/KleptonautGame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/kleptonautgame

Space Bandit Studio
Lead Producer: Richard Mao
Lead Level Designer: Nick Warren
Lead Gameplay Designer: James Thomason
Lead Developer: Luke Lai
3D Artist: Wesley Wu
Graphic Designer: Christina Hanson
Composer: Jeff Shields

For inquiries contact us at: spacebanditgame@gmail.com
